# deps/skia/src/pathops

set(SKIA_PATHOPS_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/pathops")
# set(SKIA_PATHOPS_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/pathops")

file(GLOB SKIA_PATHOPS_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_PATHOPS_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_PATHOPS_SOURCES "${SKIA_PATHOPS_DIR}/*.cpp")
# file(GLOB SKIA_PATHOPS_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_PATHOPS_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

# list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_PATHOPS_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_PATHOPS_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_PATHOPS_SOURCES})

# set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
